item.description:
FPAer's

YE meeting Bullocks 6:30.

1. flight routes 32-14, 02-20
2. Desks duties
3. Escorts
4. Break-break area
5. Altitudes Fast 2800 slow 2300
6. Air to air 123.45
7. Call sign Young Eagle flight---N number.
8. Sell popcorn :>)) soda, water?
9. ground school
10. helicopters and planes parking
11. YE certificates
12. Staging of YE ready to fly.

Please bring your suggestions and ideas to make this a safe fun event.

Thanks
Murph
